body: Hey everyone, I just joined the forums! I have been on the server since late McZone. My favourite game modes are Nebula, Avicade and CTH. Looking forward to seeing you in-game!
body_tagged: Hey everyone, I just joined the forums! I have been on the server since late McZone. My favourite game modes are Nebula, Avicade and CTH. Looking forward to seeing you in-game!
title: Hi I'm New To The Forums

replies.body: Hey , welcome to the forums if you have any questions feel free to ask us.Also if you see me in game be sure to say hi. :D
replies.body_tagged: Hey , welcome to the forums if you have any questions feel free to ask us.Also if you see me in game be sure to say hi. :D

replies.body: Welcome to forums! I hope you have a great time and swing by the teamspeak.
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to forums! I hope you have a great time and swing by the teamspeak.

replies.body:
Welcome to the forums!!
You might want to read the forum section of the rules so you don't break anything expensive.

If you have any questions, feel free to ask!
We'll be more than happy to help you out!
You can contact me on Skype if you want!
replies.body_tagged:
Welcome to the forums!!

If you have any questions, feel free to ask!
We'll be more than happy to help you out!
You can contact me on Skype if you want!

replies.body:
Welcome to the forums!
I hope you meet many many good and cool friends on here and in game!
Many people have said this before but...
If you have any questions or concerns, don't be afraid to contact a staff member about it.
Welcome!
